sentences.sContent: Instruction in these subjects in undergraduate classes is almost exclusively by lecture.
sentences.sCn: 本科生的这几门课程几乎完全是通过讲座教授的。

words.tran: 独家新闻；独家经营的项目；排外者

trans.tranOther: to refer to situations or activities that involve only the thing or things mentioned, and nothing else
